title: Narae's Portfolio
overviewContent: The portfolio project was designed as a comprehensive personal profile, serving both as a showcase of my skills and a learning tool for honing React expertise. A primary focus was on creating custom components, enabling me to build a personal component library instead of relying on pre-existing ones. This approach provided valuable hands-on experience and reinforced my React skills. Additionally, I incorporated new dependencies to broaden my technical exposure and applied responsive design principles to ensure optimal viewing across all devices. The project combines functional design with a strong emphasis on continuous skill development in full stack development.

skills: Programming: React, Redux, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Libraries/Plugins: Axios, React-query, Bootstrap, styled-component, React-router
jd: Designed and developed a comprehensive portfolio page showcasing project experience, technical skills, and professional achievements, providing a structured and user-friendly experience.

Utilised React, Redux, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build a dynamic and interactive interface. Integrated components and styling libraries, including Bootstrap and styled-components, for responsive and customisable design elements.
Implemented Axios and React-query for public data, enabling efficient data retrieval and management within the application.
Configured React-router for a smooth navigation experience, enabling multi-page views and organised structure within the portfolio.
Used GitHub for version control and collaboration, ensuring robust code management and deployment of updates.
